type: Legendary Creature – Human Pegasus Knight Warlock Peasant
rules_text:
Flying, fear[i] [i](This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)[/i]
Harrier's Fire[/i] – Whenever Faye, Obessed Harrier attacks, she deals 2 damage to target creature.
[i]Alm's Shadow[/i] – As long as you control a creature named Alm, Faye has lifelink and deathtouch.
[i]Villager Origins[/i] – Whenever a creature dealt damage by Faye dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Faye.
